price: 135. Nabii Huud: diggah anu kaxxa ayroh (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) digaalak siinih meesita koroosannuu kee Nabii dirabbossaanamak kate wayteenik keenik iyye.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
